entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
